comment: Probably file comes in conjunction with a shapefile and is one of three mandatory files used by the shapefile data format. It is used in the specification of the Esri shapefile format with the Esri ArcInfo geographic information system, where a DBF file serves as a storage for various geometrical shape attributes Format is dBase IV. Should be converted to a single-file format like geoJSON or GML
name: dBase database file
